metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12961 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
There is an assertion abort in the function parse_attributes() in data/sys-file-reader.c of the libpspp library in GNU PSPP before 1.0.1 that will lead to remote denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-12961` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

pspp - 1.0.1-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: ratliff> zesty core dumped, xenial errored out

criterions.comment: pspp package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1-1').
